alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Atchison; Holt; Nodaway; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 11:32PM CDT until June 08 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Worth County in northwestern Missouri... Eastern Atchison County in northwestern Missouri... Northeastern Holt County in northwestern Missouri... Nodaway County in northwestern Missouri... Andrew County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1132 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Blanchard to near Skidmore to near Mound City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Maryville, Savannah, Mound City, Oregon, Burlington Junction, Hopkins, Ravenwood, Maitland, Skidmore, Forest City, Fillmore, Barnard, Conception Junction, Sheridan, Parnell, Bolckow, Graham, Clearmont, Elmo and Pickering. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 64 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
